thread.section_title: Hotel Belleclaire - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (New York City) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Excellent as always
thread.title_full: Excellent as always - Review of Hotel Belleclaire, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: Sharon M
title: Excellent as always
text: Hotel Belleclaire is always our first choice for hotels when we are visiting NYC. The location, staff, cleanliness and service make us feel like guests rather than customers. The hotel has a welcoming feel and look and access to bus,s train and fabulous restaurants and shops only add to the value!
